about.title: About Mr.üÜñ ProReader
about.description: Transform any English reading material into an interactive learning experience! üöÄ With AI-powered tools, personalized content, and fun games, mastering English reading has never been this exciting.

private.title: üîí Private
private.desc: All data stays in your browser

ocr.title: üì∑ Smart OCR
ocr.desc: Snap a photo or upload images to extract text from any reading material - textbooks, worksheets, articles, and more!

adaptation.title: ‚úèÔ∏è Level Adaptation
adaptation.desc: AI rewrites text to match YOUR reading level. Switch between Original, Adapted, and Simplified versions instantly.

visual.title: üß† Visual Learning
visual.desc: Auto-generate quick summaries and interactive mind maps to understand key concepts and relationships.

sentenceAnalysis.title: üí¨ Sentence Analysis
sentenceAnalysis.desc: Click any sentence for a complete AI breakdown: meaning, vocabulary, grammar, language in use, and learning tips!

test.title: üìù Reading Test
test.desc: 6 question types, 6 skills tested, skill breakdown, retry missed questions, and targeted practice for weak areas!

glossary.title: üìñ Smart Glossary
glossary.desc: Get bilingual definitions (English + Chinese) with real-world example sentences for every word you highlight.

flashcard.title: üÉè Flashcard Review
flashcard.desc: Flip through interactive cards to learn vocabulary. Rate each word (Easy/Medium/Hard) to track your progress. Prioritize hard words for focused review!

spelling.title: üéÆ Spelling Games
spelling.desc: 4 exciting modes: Listen & Type, Letter Scramble, Fill Blanks, and Mixed! Earn streaks and beat your best score!

quiz.title: üìã Vocabulary Quiz
quiz.desc: Test your knowledge with word-to-definition, definition-to-word, and fill-in-the-blank questions.

tts.title: üîä Text-to-Speech
tts.desc: Perfect your pronunciation! Listen to any word or sentence read aloud in natural voice.

wordExport.title: üìÑ Word Export
wordExport.desc: Download your text, glossary, and sentence analysis as a Word document for offline study and printing.

workflow.upload: Upload photos of your reading material
workflow.summary: Get a quick summary of the content
workflow.mindmap: Explore with an interactive mind map
workflow.adapt: Read text adapted to your level

spelling.title: Spelling Challenge
spelling.subtitle: Practice spelling {{count}} words
spelling.notEnoughWords: Need at least 3 words for spelling game
spelling.aboutDesc: Practice spelling through interactive games designed to reinforce vocabulary learning.

modeDesc.listen-type: Listen to the word pronunciation and type what you hear. Great for auditory learning!
modeDesc.scramble: Rearrange jumbled letters to form the correct word. A visual puzzle approach!
modeDesc.fill-blanks: Type the missing letters shown as underscores. Focus on specific letter patterns!
modeDesc.mixed: Randomly switches between all modes for variety and comprehensive practice!

spelling.tipStreak: Build streaks for bonus points (+10% per 3 consecutive)
spelling.tipHint: Use hints wisely - they reveal letters but reduce your score

history.title: Reading History
history.description: Your reading sessions are stored locally in your browser.
